thread.title: Hike the Pacific Crest Trail in three minutes
thread.title_full: Hike the Pacific Crest Trail in three minutes

title: Hike the Pacific Crest Trail in three minutes
text:
Hike the Pacific Crest Trail in three minutes Last updated 09:47, July 20 2015 Youtube/Halfway Anywhere 
Youtuber Halfway Anywhere has condensed his footage of gruelling Pacific Trail Hike into a three-minute video. 
Stretching over 4000 kilometres from Mexico to Canada, the Pacific Crest Trail is both beautiful and brutal. 
The long-distance hiking path winds its way through pristine mountainous terrain, glaciated expanses, deserts and national forests in California, Oregon and Washington. 
After the success of the movie Wild, starring Reese Witherspoon , bookings for the trail have increased dramatically. 
But the perilous trail can take months to complete, and many give up before reaching the end. 
For those armchair travellers out there who aren't brave enough to embark on such a journey, Youtuber Halfway Anywhere has condensed his footage of the hike into an easy three-minute video.
